value.title: Differences between Power BI Apps and Workspaces
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you the difference between Power Bi Apps and workspaces and what do I use them for. I also explain why I think that workspaces are too messy for the business user or data consumer.  Links to resources mentioned in the video: The new App Navigation video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Bo0HHUcuas

value.title: Extract in Power Query (LEN, LEFT, RIGHT in excel) - #6 (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the equivalents of LEN, LEFT; RIGHT in Power Query. You can create very complex transformations using the interface in Power Query. value.title: How to embed Power BI in Sharepoint Online

value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible
